'''William Johnson''' (May [[1924]] &ndash; [[23 September]] [[2016]]) was a New Zealand actor born in Hebden Bridge, England. He played [[Old Noakes]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. He only appeared in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]].

In June [[2007]], Johnson and 14 other actors filed [https://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties.<ref>{{webcite|author=MrCere|articleurl=https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2007/06/01/23983-actors-join-to-sue-new-line-over-lotr-merchandising/|articlename=Actors join to sue New Line over LOTR merchandising|dated=1 June 2007|website=TORN|accessed=3 December 2024}}</ref> The action was settled out of court in October [[2008]].<ref>{{webcite|author=MrCere|articleurl=https://www.theonering.net/torwp/2008/10/08/30205-new-zealand-actors-settle-out-of-court-with-new-line-cinema/|articlename=New Zealand actors settle out of court with New Line|dated=8 October 2008|website=TORN|accessed=3 December 2024}}</ref>
